column1:
event,"

okay, well to start off with, HAPPY FUCKIN TURKEY DAY BITCHES...... NOW THATS OVER WITH, I SPENT THE NIGHT OVER FREDS HOUSE.
column2: well i though maybe this will be a good thing. WRONG! he woke uo in the grumppiest mood and well, he had a head cold i think and the plans were he was going to my parents house with me at 1 and dinner with his family at 6. well, i didnt want to do anything, and we got into a little fight and i left, like 3 hours later he calls, me, wanting to know if im comming back over or not, thats his way of saying im sorry i think. but after that we had a really good time together. its out first real thanksgiving together and his family.&nbsp
column3: well, all i could think about was how thankful i am for being here.

column1: living in florida not georgia anymore.
to be with my family and friends that care.
that my brother is doing better.

mostly, to have fred in my life, and how lucky i am to have such a wonderful person in my life. i thank god for everyday i get to be with him. fred is my night and shining armor.

"

event,"<STRONG><FONT color=#6600cc>well fred and i had a good day to start off with. hes just started his new job and i start mine this thursday. well we havent been able to hang out let alone talk alot. so i went to his house, i cleaned up his room and chris came over. chris has been staying over freds house till he gets a car, he rides with fred to work in the morning. well for some reason i was having an off day and we had such a good day together that i didnt want anything to screw up. our relationship has been great for the most part. well, he told me i was being way to overbaering and not acting myself. and we sat down and talked and he says i need to work on my atittude, my wearabouts and just not worry so much about getting hurt again. just take life in strides and go with it.. he doesnt understand why im so woried. fred and i have been together for 3 years off and on so many times. that im so scared to death of loosing him and having nothing. all these times weve broken up, well i always have that what if feeling in the back of my head. fred is my everything. id do anything to make him happy. theres no question that i want to spend the rest of my life with him. hes such an awsome person and i want him in my life and one day have a family.&nbsp
column2: but i agree with him that moving in with him wouldnt be a good idea to a point. it would be hard on the relationship. and ive heard you cant live with them unless your going to get married. it just doesnt work. but i cant stand being away from him. i guess thats just the person ive become. im to depended on him. i wish i had a car. id fined a better job, have a life out side of my house and be more active. thats whats holding me back. i dont care if all m y money goes towards bills and my car, at least having it would be better for me. id have freedom. and i wouldnt be so up tight with fred. i think im driving him away sometimes. and thats the last thing i want to do, ill give him all the space he needs just to keep him happy. hes the light in my life. hes my best friend and nothing is worth loosing that. thats another thing, my friend chris from georgia is comming down. yes chris and i have ""dated"" but i dont want fred to think bad thoughts of him. im trying to put myself in freds shoes, now if that girl ""alley"" came down to stay at his house for 3 days, how would i feel? i tell you what id be a nervus freak, wouldnt sleep, up all night wondering whats going on, what does she want with him and stupid things, but the fact is, i know fred doesnt want anything like that with alley. and i hope fred knows that chris and i are just friends and nothing will ever happen. i have nothing against alley ecept the fact that they had sex once, thats what fred tells me. and him and alley used to be really good friends. well, ive never had sex with chris, i did nothing behind freds back while i was in georgia and fred has nothing to worry about. but i do understand where hes comming from. so thats why when i get this job, im going to save money to put chris and his friend oliver in a hotel, so they dont have to stay at my house and that will prevent so much shit. and hopfuly chris and fred will get along. "
your eyes, and how i see your heart through them.
the roughness of your hands, shows how hard working you are, yet soft enough to touch me.
how your lips get pouty when your angry, and seem to say i love you without even breathing a word.
you know what im thinking, and when somethings on my mind.
that your so sure of yourself, even when i know a better way.
when your just sitting next to me, i feel so complete and warm.
even though i tend to walk ahead of you, your right there to open the door for me.
how you carelessly walk around with this bad boy look yet i know your a teddy bear inside.
when you hold my hand and look so proud.
when we have our fights and can still hold eachother in the end.
the times you make love to me and you make sweet little humms.
how when i kiss you, your beard tickles my chin.
the whispers of love in my ear you tell me.
your smile, how you only do it when you truly mean it.
your man smell when you come home from a long hard day at work.
when your sleeping, the little whistle noise you make.
how you hold me like a pillow when you cuddle.
i know you love me without telling me.
that your so independant and seem to need nobody in your life to help you.
the way you stand like a redneck when you think no one is watching.
when you tell jokes, i dont think are funny but i laugh to reasure you.
the fear you put in me of one day loosing you.
when you open my eyes to a different point of view even if i dont like it.
how you try to understand me and listen.
you trust me.
when you lick my face to make me smile.
how we have our little inside jokes that nobody else knows.
your patcient with me and my thoughts.
you always try your best to make things right.
your not a tipickle guy.
how hairy your belly is.
youll try anything once.
i can tell you secrets and youll never tell.
how i can feel you hold me when your nowhere near.
that you fart and burb infront of me.

i still feel your last kiss on my lips.

"

column1: event,"i feel so bad for freddy. his parents took his car, his house key and his next 3 pay checks away from him. hes alomst 19 and cant do shity about it!. how fucked up is that? yes he deserves some of the punishment do to the party he had while his parents were out of town but thats a little harsh. the reason hes in trouble is because he let people in the house and stupid shit happend. this girl was sitting on the stove and her big ass broke the oven door. then someone carved into his moms coffee table with a pen. so yes if i were freddys parents i would be a little pissed to, but damn thats a little much i think. i love freddy but he isnt always the brightest crayon in the box. but ill do anything to help him and be there for him because im hid girlfriend and im there for him just like he is for me. so just like any other problem, we'll work through it and be fine."
and you feel like you can't get enough air
When it feels like you're being crushed
and it seems like real company is rare
! I'll be the one to kiss you
C! The kiss that brings you back to life
H! I'll be the one to save you
O! Like me you've saved me so many times
R! But if there is one thing
! I'd still be a lost soul
When you wake up honestly still dreaming
and there's that throbbing in your chest
you find yourself really wanting those lips
Just know that I'll come running
and I'll try to do my best
all to bring you that life saving kiss
She watched life pass her by
She caught the tears that fell down
Put them in a jar and drowned
Alcohol takes it away for a while
She sees the faces as they stare
Her fate, unimportant to unseeing eyes
Their words through cracked lips: lies
She walks among the fakest crowd
Thinking hate with the music loud
No longer hear the words they say
Cut you to pieces by the end of the day
Her head clouded its hard to see
She says her anthem ""Stop hurting me""
Feet shuffle, walk on through the stream
Of people too self occupied to hear her scream
FUCK YOUR LIES, FUCK YOUR HEART
FAKE AND EMPTY, IT RIPS ME APART
HOW MANY FAKE SMILES CAN YOU MAKE
IN THE END ALL THE FACADES WILL BREAK""
She screams and screams, still no sound
Life's too short, life's too jaded
She's the key to all she's hated
At home that night she's still screaming
As he yells she prays she's dreaming
He finally leaves, she falls to the ground
Nobody left to bring her around
Thinking of the pain and how it kills
She gets out the bottle and swallows the pills
The alcohol numbs, the pills set her free
She screams her anthem ""Stop hurting me""
suddenly evenyone is so silent and afraid
no one to catch me when i fall back around
on one to see me when my heart cracks down
darkness traps me into a hell
no oneto catch me when i fall back around
no one to see me when my heart cracks down

what i have left of you

"

event,"do i love them or keep hating them. do i take their side or throw them to the curb. all these thoughts swirl deep into a pit of my misery. all these emotions tumble inside like a knife to my back. who ever thought of such discrace, who ever thought of such dignity. taken by suprise, stole all my happiness. taken by faith, neglect all their trust. why must it be this way. it is me who dares to challenge the world. ill take it all on with a mind of my own and I BET I WIN!"

event,"

things just havent been the same around here. people talk, people stare, oh Casey come out and play. an unfortunate soul was lost. dr. said, im sorry, not much i can do. the air was so still. his eyes they did not blink. oh casey come out and play. little miss erin loved him. she vowed to always watch over her brother. still he did not move. dr. said its no use. oh Casey come out and play. dad sat by his side, watched the years fly by. he looked so fragile. he wondered why Casey was still alive at all. everyone in town had that im so sorry look. we talked in a sorrow whisper. hush, just turn the machines off. but dad sat by his side. he said heaven , he wont be denied. oh Casey come out and play. yellow flowers lay at his bed side. so he just sits and stares, daddy brushes his hand over Casey's eyes and says goodbye son. ill see you again real soon. oh Casey come out and play. little miss erin grew up so lovely. she visits him with mommy on sundays. casey still like an unused toy. he had such big hands but the mind of a little boy. oh Casey come out and play. things just havent been the same around here.

"
event,"<font size=""7"">so this is my first writing. resently, ive been
struggling between jobs, hoping i dont get fired. almost done with
school and i might get kicked out of my house for not having a steady
income. thats horeshit. im only 18, i want to live and be a kid again.
i dont want all these responcible tasks to worry about. i want a chance
to have fun and not worry about paying bills yet. or worry about my
relationship with freddy. i love him to death and i know we will be
together no matter what. but thats just me im a worry freak. if i dont
worry who will. resently, freddy and i have been fighting over some
pretty stupid shit. well my best friend kara has been right by my side
through it all. so i praise her!!!!! big time for sticking by my side.
but all is well and freddy and i are better then ever.
